name: Catch That Chicken
description:
Your name is Billy Cox from South Alabama. Your girlfriend is about to dump you if you don't give her money. You are broke and destitute when you hear about The Catch the Chicken Competition. You are eager to enter and make some money.

A fun challenging game with many ways of catching different animals.

Game still under development.

Is a bit buggy.

Tell us what you think

NOTE

Get the ENTRY CODE for free here
